charts.name: Top 5 Monthly Usage Cost by Namespace

sources.name: CPU Usage
sources.query: aliasMetric(aliasSource(sum(align(60m, mean, ts("kubernetes.ns.cpu.usage_rate", cluster="*" and namespace_name="*")), namespace_name), "{{namespace_name}}"), "CPU Usage")/1000

sources.name: Memory Usage
sources.query: aliasMetric(aliasSource(sum(align(60m, mean, ts("kubernetes.ns.memory.usage", cluster="*" and namespace_name="*")), namespace_name), "{{namespace_name}}"), "Memory Usage")/(1024 * 1024 *1024)

sources.name: CPU Request
sources.query: aliasMetric(aliasSource(sum(align(60m, mean, ts("kubernetes.ns.cpu.request", cluster="*"  and namespace_name="*")), namespace_name), "{{namespace_name}}"), "CPU Request")/1000

sources.name: Memory Request
sources.query: aliasMetric(aliasSource(sum(align(60m, mean, ts("kubernetes.ns.memory.request", cluster="*"  and namespace_name="*")), namespace_name), "{{namespace_name}}"), "Memory Request")/(1024 * 1024 *1024)

sources.name: CPU Limit
sources.query: aliasMetric(aliasSource(sum(align(60m, mean, ts("kubernetes.ns.cpu.limit", cluster="*"  and namespace_name="*")), namespace_name), "{{namespace_name}}"), "CPU Limit")/1000

sources.name: Memory Limit
sources.query: aliasMetric(aliasSource(sum(align(60m, mean, ts("kubernetes.ns.memory.limit", cluster="*"  and namespace_name="*")), namespace_name), "{{namespace_name}}"), "Memory Limit")/(1024 * 1024 *1024)

sources.name: A
sources.query: aliasMetric((${CPU Usage}*${_cpu_cost}[+]${Memory Usage}*${_memory_per_GB})*730, 'Total Usage Cost per month ($)')

sources.name: A Clone
sources.query: aliasMetric((${CPU Request}*${_cpu_cost}[+]${Memory Request}*${_memory_per_GB})*730, 'Total Request Cost per month ($)')

sources.name: A Clone 2
sources.query: aliasMetric((${CPU Limit}*${_cpu_cost}[+]${Memory Limit}*${_memory_per_GB})*730, 'Total Limit Cost per month ($)')

charts.name: Top 5 Monthly Requested Cost by Namespace

sources.name: CPU Usage
sources.query: aliasMetric(aliasSource(sum(align(60m, mean, ts("kubernetes.ns.cpu.usage_rate", cluster="*" and namespace_name="*")), namespace_name), "{{namespace_name}}"), "CPU Usage")/1000

sources.name: Memory Usage
sources.query: aliasMetric(aliasSource(sum(align(60m, mean, ts("kubernetes.ns.memory.usage", cluster="*" and namespace_name="*")), namespace_name), "{{namespace_name}}"), "Memory Usage")/(1024 * 1024 *1024)

sources.name: CPU Request
sources.query: aliasMetric(aliasSource(sum(align(60m, mean, ts("kubernetes.ns.cpu.request", cluster="*"  and namespace_name="*")), namespace_name), "{{namespace_name}}"), "CPU Request")/1000

sources.name: Memory Request
sources.query: aliasMetric(aliasSource(sum(align(60m, mean, ts("kubernetes.ns.memory.request", cluster="*"  and namespace_name="*")), namespace_name), "{{namespace_name}}"), "Memory Request")/(1024 * 1024 *1024)

sources.name: CPU Limit
sources.query: aliasMetric(aliasSource(sum(align(60m, mean, ts("kubernetes.ns.cpu.limit", cluster="*"  and namespace_name="*")), namespace_name), "{{namespace_name}}"), "CPU Limit")/1000

sources.name: Memory Limit
sources.query: aliasMetric(aliasSource(sum(align(60m, mean, ts("kubernetes.ns.memory.limit", cluster="*"  and namespace_name="*")), namespace_name), "{{namespace_name}}"), "Memory Limit")/(1024 * 1024 *1024)

sources.name: A
sources.query: aliasMetric((${CPU Usage}*${_cpu_cost}[+]${Memory Usage}*${_memory_per_GB})*730, 'Total Usage Cost per month ($)')

sources.name: A Clone
sources.query: aliasMetric((${CPU Request}*${_cpu_cost}[+]${Memory Request}*${_memory_per_GB})*730, 'Total Request Cost per month ($)')

sources.name: A Clone 2
sources.query: aliasMetric((${CPU Limit}*${_cpu_cost}[+]${Memory Limit}*${_memory_per_GB})*730, 'Total Limit Cost per month ($)')

sources.name: A
sources.query: align(1m, count(ts("kubernetes.node.memory.usage", cluster="${cluster_name}")))

sources.name: A Clone
sources.query: ts("kubernetes.node.memory.usage", cluster="${cluster_name}")

sources.name: utilization
sources.query: ts("kubernetes.node.memory.working_set", cluster="${cluster_name}")/ts("kubernetes.node.memory.node_allocatable", cluster="${cluster_name}")

sources.name: avg_util
sources.query: avg(${utilization}) * 100

sources.name: utilization
sources.query: avg(align(60s, mean, ts("kubernetes.node.cpu.node_utilization", cluster="${cluster_name}"))) * 100

sources.name: alloc_cpu_cores
sources.query: aliasMetric(ts("kubernetes.node.cpu.node_capacity", cluster="${cluster_name}"), "CPU Cores")/1000

sources.name: alloc_mem_bytes
sources.query: aliasMetric( ts("kubernetes.node.memory.node_capacity", cluster="${cluster_name}" )/(1024 * 1024 *1024), "Memory GB")

sources.name: A
sources.query: sum(at('end',aliasMetric((${alloc_cpu_cores}*${_cpu_cost}[+]${alloc_mem_bytes}*${_memory_per_GB})*730, 'Total Cost per month (R)')))

sources.name: alloc_cpu_cores
sources.query: aliasMetric(ts("kubernetes.node.cpu.node_capacity", cluster="${cluster_name}"), "CPU Cores")/1000

sources.name: alloc_mem_bytes
sources.query: aliasMetric( ts("kubernetes.node.memory.node_capacity", cluster="${cluster_name}" )/(1024 * 1024 *1024), "Memory GB")

sources.name: A
sources.query: aliasMetric(((${alloc_cpu_cores}*${_cpu_cost})[+](${alloc_mem_bytes}*${_memory_per_GB})), 'Total Cost per hour ($)')

sources.name: A Clone 2
sources.query: aliasMetric(((${alloc_cpu_cores}*${_cpu_cost})[+](${alloc_mem_bytes}*${_memory_per_GB}))*24, 'Total Cost per day ($)')

sources.name: A Clone
sources.query: aliasMetric((${alloc_cpu_cores}*${_cpu_cost}[+]${alloc_mem_bytes}*${_memory_per_GB})*730, 'Total Cost per month ($)')

sources.name: CPU Usage
sources.query: aliasMetric(aliasSource(sum(align(60m, mean, ts("kubernetes.ns.cpu.usage_rate", cluster="${cluster_name}" and namespace_name="${namespace}")), namespace_name), "{{namespace_name}}"), "CPU Usage")/1000

sources.name: Memory Usage
sources.query: aliasMetric(aliasSource(sum(align(60m, mean, ts("kubernetes.ns.memory.usage", cluster="${cluster_name}" and namespace_name="${namespace}")), namespace_name), "{{namespace_name}}"), "Memory Usage")/(1024 * 1024 *1024)

sources.name: CPU Request
sources.query: aliasMetric(aliasSource(sum(align(60m, mean, ts("kubernetes.ns.cpu.request", cluster="${cluster_name}"  and namespace_name="${namespace}")), namespace_name), "{{namespace_name}}"), "CPU Request")/1000

sources.name: Memory Request
sources.query: aliasMetric(aliasSource(sum(align(60m, mean, ts("kubernetes.ns.memory.request", cluster="${cluster_name}"  and namespace_name="${namespace}")), namespace_name), "{{namespace_name}}"), "Memory Request")/(1024 * 1024 *1024)

sources.name: CPU Limit
sources.query: aliasMetric(aliasSource(sum(align(60m, mean, ts("kubernetes.ns.cpu.limit", cluster="${cluster_name}"  and namespace_name="${namespace}")), namespace_name), "{{namespace_name}}"), "CPU Limit")/1000

sources.name: Memory Limit
sources.query: aliasMetric(aliasSource(sum(align(60m, mean, ts("kubernetes.ns.memory.limit", cluster="${cluster_name}"  and namespace_name="${namespace}")), namespace_name), "{{namespace_name}}"), "Memory Limit")/(1024 * 1024 *1024)

sources.name: A
sources.query: aliasMetric((${CPU Usage}*${_cpu_cost}[+]${Memory Usage}*${_memory_per_GB})*730, 'Total Usage Cost per month (R)')

sources.name: A Clone
sources.query: aliasMetric((${CPU Request}*${_cpu_cost}[+]${Memory Request}*${_memory_per_GB})*730, 'Total Request Cost per month (R)')

sources.name: A Clone 2
sources.query: aliasMetric((${Memory Limit}*${_memory_per_GB})*730, 'Total Limit Cost per month (R)')

charts.name: PODs Cost Breakdown

sources.name: cpu_used
sources.query: max(ts("kubernetes.pod.cpu.usage_rate", cluster="${cluster_name}" and namespace_name="${namespace}" and type="pod"), sources, pod_name).gt(0)

sources.name: memory_used
sources.query: max(ts("kubernetes.pod.memory.usage", cluster="${cluster_name}" and namespace_name="${namespace}" and type="pod"), sources, pod_name).gt(0)

sources.name: cpu_request
sources.query: max(ts("kubernetes.pod.cpu.request", cluster="${cluster_name}" and namespace_name="${namespace}" and type="pod"), sources, pod_name).gt(0)

sources.name: memory_request
sources.query: max(ts("kubernetes.pod.memory.request", cluster="${cluster_name}" and namespace_name="${namespace}" and type="pod"), sources, pod_name).gt(0)

sources.name: cpu_limit
sources.query: aliasMetric(mavg(1vw,ts("kubernetes.pod.cpu.limit", cluster="${cluster_name}" and namespace_name="${namespace}" and type="pod").gt(0)), "Limit")

sources.name: memory_limit
sources.query: aliasMetric(mavg(1vw,ts("kubernetes.pod.memory.limit", cluster="${cluster_name}" and namespace_name="${namespace}" and type="pod").gt(0)), "Limit")

sources.name: cpu
sources.query:
join(
${cpu_used} AS ts1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ${${_cpu_cost_basis}} AS ts2 USING(source, pod_name),
  metric='${_cpu_cost_basis} (Cores)', pod_name=ts1.pod_name, source=ts2.source,
  (ts2 / 1000 ) 
  )

sources.name: memory
sources.query:
join(
${memory_used} AS ts1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ${${_memory_cost_basis}} AS ts2 USING(source, pod_name),
  metric='${_memory_cost_basis} (GB)', pod_name=ts1.pod_name, source=ts2.source,
  (ts2 / (1024 * 1024 *1024)) 
  )

sources.name: cpu cost
sources.query: aliasMetric( ${cpu} * ${_cpu_cost} * 24,'${_cpu_cost_basis} per 24 hr ($)' )

sources.name: memory cost
sources.query: aliasMetric( ${memory} * ${_memory_per_GB} * 24,'${_memory_cost_basis} per 24 hr ($)' )

sources.name: total cost
sources.query: aliasMetric((${cpu cost} [+] ${memory cost}), 'Total Cost per day ($)')

sources.name: total cost Clone
sources.query: aliasMetric((${total cost}) * 30, 'Total Cost per month ($)')

charts.description: The number of Available, Desired and Ready replicas per deployment.
